Text:
ahh, nostalgin....

Baldur's Gate tillsammans med Fallout och Planescape Torment måste nog vara universumets bästa rollspel... sitter fortfarande och spelar dom när man är trött på annat...

btw, det heter "Baldur's Gate - Tales of the Sword Coast"
Haha...Snacka om fel det blev. Naturligtvis heter den ju det. Måste varit förvirrad när jag skrev in det.
Måste tyvärr stänga av datorn under natten...återkommer imorgon bitti...   :(
Måste man originalspelet för att kunna spela denna ?
japp, måste man
Can someone please help seed this wonderful gem of a game? Thanks!
Jag får upp "this version will only run on english language operating systems." Någon som har en lösning?
I will help seed for two days.
The CD says this will only run in the USA or Canada.. does anyone know how to by pass this? My original BG 5CD game IS the USA version.
kan någon seeda, tack?

Can someone PLEASE seed? I've been looking for this for a-g-e-s, and I finally thought to look here. Also, I know that this will only run in the USA/Canada, but is it in English? The regions kinda make that obvious, but just to be on the safe side! Thanks!
Ah, also, do I need Acohol 120% or Nero to burn the .nrg file? Or do they both work?
seed plz?!
may anyone seed plz???
strange that it only works on english systems, I have the original from USA and it still works on my swedish system
seed please
seed please!!

Come on guys, we need a little more seeding. I see 4 people (including me) stuck on 98.9%... Makes me very sad. :(

Not only that, but I'm not even uploading while stuck on 98.9%...
Can anyone seed this? 4 or 5 of us just stuck at 97% and I'd really like to get this finished. Thanks!
lagmer. jävla apostråf paragraf regeryttar idiot nörd fitta vem fan bryr sig om apostråfen!!!!??
SEED PLEASE!

Hi guys, friendly helpful here. If you're getting the US/Canada problem, simply do this;
Get the latest US/Canada patch from BioWare.

http://www.bioware.com/games/baldurs_gate/support/patches/

Have fun, it's a great game. I personally bought it, but I'm so sick of swapping CDs to be honest.
